column2: "I mean... I've never even received formal ARKS training, you know?"
"Even my Dad didn't teach me a thing about how to use weapons."
"I've always just been trying my best to keep up with you and Manon."
"And then one day, I kinda just... had my own fighting style."
"I can't really convey that experience to my trainees very well."

"Like, I've always just done everything by feeling. How do I even
put that into words, let alone teach it to others, you know?"

"...I stumbled over my words, and then start panicking and
stumble even more, and my trainees just look at me like \"Huh?\"."
"Bruder will step in and explain what I'm trying to say, but still..."
"Hahhh... Putting it all into words is really difficult."
"What do you think I should do?"
"Have you tried asking Bruder for help?"
"Have you tried asking various people for help?"
"Yeah, but he was like \"I want you to try figuring this out for yourself.\""
"Hmmm... Maybe I could ask other people for help?"
"Right. Staying all wishy-washy isn't gonna get me anywhere, right?"
"And thanks. You're always looking out for me!"
